items.content_html: LupineJs is a React-like, extremely fast, small size and lightweight frontend framework.
items.title: uuware/lupine.js: LupineJs is a React-like, extremely fast, small size and lightweight frontend framework.

items.content_html: LupineApi is a fast, lightweight, and flexible node.js based server, working with LupineJs to provide SSR and modern JavaScript features for web applications and APIs.
items.title: uuware/lupine.api: LupineApi is a fast, lightweight, and flexible node.js based server, working with LupineJs to provide SSR and modern JavaScript features for web applications and APIs.

items.content_html: A lightweight blockchain explorer tailored for the Energi blockchain, offering users a simplified yet insightful way to view transactions, wallet addresses, and block details in real time.

items.content_html: SharpTeX is a lightweight syntax system that converts to LaTeX, helping students format reports, theses, and other academic documents easily.

items.content_html: Layouter is a lightweight React utility for creating responsive masonry-style layouts. It distributes items across 1–4 columns based on their height and supports custom render logic, with optional getId and getHeight accessors for flexible integration.
items.title: HassanMostafaa/react-broken-layouter: Layouter is a lightweight React utility for creating responsive masonry-style layouts. It distributes items across 1–4 columns based on their height and supports custom render logic, with optional getId and getHeight accessors for flexible integration.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that creates typewriter effects by displaying characters one by one.
items.title: 4anghyeon/echo-text: A lightweight TypeScript library that creates typewriter effects by displaying characters one by one.

items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: A simple and lightweight Notes App built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This web-based application allows users to create, view, and delete notes directly in the browser. All data is stored locally using LocalStorage, so your notes stay safe even after refreshing or closing the tab.
items.title: shruticl-03/Notes-App: A simple and lightweight Notes App built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This web-based application allows users to create, view, and delete notes directly in the browser. All data is stored locally using LocalStorage, so your notes stay safe even after refreshing or closing the tab.
